title.rendered: Locating Lost Files Using Quick Scroll

content.rendered:
One of the fastest ways to find a lost file on Dumpster, is by using the quick scroll.

When scrolling through Deep Scan Recovery, the quick scroll widget will appear on the right.

By holding it, you can quickly jump to specific dates when your lost image, video or audio file was created.
